Unicron/Teufel/Vehement:



Standing inside the main control room of the volcano base of Rana Kao, 
Unicron started at the dozen feet high golden pyramid Guardian computer.  A 
golden hue tendril had wrapped around the Chaos-Bringer's head and he looked 
like he had frozen in place.  In reality he was directly linked to the highly 
advanced computer based on similar creations by numerous alien species that 
Unicron had devoured in his long fruitful life.

The tendril unwrapped itself and Unicron's optics seemed to glow a little 
brighter.  "We must make some modifications to Teufel.  And you, Vehement, 
must learn more about this volcanic fortress and its secrets."

"Understood, mighty Unicron.  For the betterment of our cause.  What shall I 
do?"

"Step to the Guardian and let meld with you and it will do the rest."

"As you command." Vehement said, stepping up to the computer.  A golden hue 
tendril extended from the glow of the Guardian and wrapped around Vehement's 
head, his face nothing more than a blank expression.

"Now, Teufel, it is time to perfect you."

"Begriff, allmachtige Fuhrer." the robot replied, speaking in German with a 
deep German accent.

Teufel walked over to a chamber, the doors sealing.  Unicron walked over to 
the chamber and put his hand on a golden panel, his hand and forearm lightly 
glowing gold and his optic sensors going from emerald to black.
